title: Sound Techniques
description:
Trains professionals for the manipulation of sound and it’s equipment.

Develops skills as a technical artistic collaborator in activities related to sound.

Transmit knowledge about sound recording, post production and mastering for the creative industries.

Promotes the technical knowledge of the equipment and stimulates innovative creativity in the sound context.

Learn from trainers who are active in the musical scene, the musical tools to transform your ideas into music on a professional level.

During the course you have access to recording/production studios, audio post production and mastering rooms in partnership with Zipmix Studio and Coalman Recordings.

By concluding this training, you will have the possibility of participating in our European Mobility Project ERASMUS+.

ETIC_Algarve provides the possibility of attending a 320h Internship, for the trainees that fulfill the requirements.
author: John Doe

title: Electronic Music Creation and Production
description:
Trains professionals for music creation and production.

Develop skills of music production and creation for the music industry.

Prepares one for traditional music creation as well as with the support of technology, by working with specialised software and equipment.

Promotes musical knowledge and stimulates innovative creativity in the musical context.

During the course you have access to recording/production studios, audio post production and mastering rooms in partnership with Zipmix Studio and Coalman Recordings.

Learn from trainers who are active in the musical scene, the musical tools to transform your ideas into music on a professional level.

By concluding this training, you will have the possibility of participating in our European Mobility Project ERASMUS+.

ETIC_Algarve provides the possibility of attending a 320h Internship, for the trainees that fulfill the requirements of JUMP – Support to Professional Integration.
author: John Doe

title: Digital Marketing and Social Media
description:
FROM: Following online trends 🤳 TO: Becoming the trendsetter in the digital world 📊
Prepare to be a complete professional capable of planning, managing, and optimizing Digital Marketing strategies focused on results, combining organic and paid content, SEO, social media, email marketing, and data analysis.

Upon completing this programme, you will have the opportunity to participate in our ERASMUS+ European mobility project.

ETIC_Algarve offers the possibility of a 320-hour internship for students who meet the requirements of JUMP – Professional Integration Support.
author: Jane Doe

title: Photography
description:
Qualifies to start Photographic practice in the fields of: Portrait, Advertisement, Real Estate or Architecture and Photojournalism.

Develop theoretical and practical skills of handling and operating the equipment and of photographic post production.

Raises awareness on the usage of photography as a form of expression, visual and artistic communication.

By concluding this training, you will have the possibility of participating in our European Mobility Project ERASMUS+.

ETIC_Algarve provides the possibility of attending a 320h Internship, for the trainees that fulfill the requirements of JUMP – Support to Professional Integration.
author: Jane Doe

title: Graphic Design
description:
Trains Design professionals able to produce visual communication projects for brands, products and services.

Provides specialised skills in image editing tools, typography treatment and vectorial drawing.

Develops creative skills and techniques for the elaboration of visual identity projects for brands, publicity campaigns and editorial design.

Provides skills for creating and monitoring projects with and for real clients.

By concluding this training, you will have the possibility of participating in our European Mobility Project ERASMUS+.

ETIC_Algarve provides the possibility of attending a 320h Internship, for the trainees that fulfill the requirements of JUMP – Support to Professional Integration.
author: Jane Doe

title: Concept Art
description:
This course allows to develop practical skills in character and scenery drawing for video games conceptual art.

At the base of entertainment industry, there is a need for artists who can define concepts from thin air or basic ideas, for all the elements that compose games and movies we appreciate so much. Artists with the skill to incorporate aesthetic, cultural and technical elements to create characters, adversaries, backgrounds, machines and creatures for diverse media.

By concluding this training, you will have the possibility of participating in our European Mobility Project ERASMUS+.

ETIC_Algarve provides the possibility of attending a 320h Internship, for the trainees that fulfill the requirements of JUMP – Support to Professional Integration.
author: Jane Doe

title: Video Games - Developer & Designer
author: John Doe

title: Directing For Cinema And TV
description:
Develops technical and creative skills for creation of audiovisual contents for the video, cinema and television industries.

Transmits knowledge about camera operation, lighting and sound, as well as the fundamental training to integrate in any phase of the development of an audiovisual project: directing, pre-production, production, post-production and editing.

Promotes research, analysis and the practice of themes inherent to the creation of audiovisual contents.

Develops professional skills necessary for the integration in the audiovisual world and context.
author: John Doe

title: Web Development - Full Stack
description:
How to talk to machines

With the extreme technological advances that the world has been going through lately, there is a huge need in the job market to hire IT professionals capable of developing Cloud-based solutions that are also interactive and appealing to their users.

In this course, you will learn the necessary concepts to work on the web and in the cloud, using technologies such as HTML, CSS, Javascript, Python, Github, Docker, etc.

The aim is for trainees to be able to develop a web project in all its aspects: Backend, Frontend, Infrastructure, etc.
author: John Doe

title: Songwriting
description:
FROM: Writing lyrics in phone notes 📱 TO: Composing catchy songs that stick with you!
Integrate into the music industry by developing skills in writing and composition, idea creation and direction, demo creation, pre-production, recording basics, and performance. Introduction to recording and music creation software and mixing techniques.

Learn about the music market processes and the basic tools to create and execute an original idea in various musical genres.

Upon completing this programme, you will have the opportunity to participate in our European mobility project ERASMUS+.

ETIC_Algarve offers the possibility of a 320-hour internship for students who meet the requirements of JUMP – Professional Integration Support.
author: John Doe

title: Post-Production of Video and VFX
description:
Become a professional capable of applying visual effects techniques in cinematic productions, from filming to post-production, using industry-standard software, addressing the integration of VFX with image capture.

Gain expertise in the entire audiovisual post-production pipeline, from basic theoretical foundations to advanced techniques in digital compositing, 3D tracking, object animation, and colour grading.

Acquire skills in software such as Premiere Pro, Blender, Red Giant, After Effects, and DaVinci Resolve. Prepare to create audiovisual projects that integrate CGI (Computer Generated Imagery), motion graphics, and live-action, culminating in the production of a competitive professional portfolio for the national and international VFX market.

Develops professional skills necessary for the integration in the audiovisual world and context.
author: John Doe

title: Professional Photography
description:
Trains professionals with creative and technical skills necessary for photographic practice in the various areas of photography.

Develop creative and technical skills for the practice of photography applied to different contexts: Advertisement, Fashion, Journalism, Portrait, Nude, Events Real Estate/ A rchitecture and Post-Production

Sensitizes the usage of photography as a form of artistic expression and visual communication.

Transmits knowledge about all the photographic production process, from scheduling, to execution and printing.
author: Jane Doe

title: Communication Design & Multimedia
description:
Comprehensive knowledge about the fundamental communication design subjects as well as for the new media: multimedia, web design, video editing, etc.

Provide a wide and complete knowledge about the essential elements for the elaboration of a graphic project.
Expand the acquired technical and aesthetical basics to the new media.

Creation and development of experiences, interfaces and interactive digital content (websites, apps, social media, etc.);

Create solutions with a 3D software, allowing to build simple three dimensional objects.

Editing, post-producing, planning and structuring a video project.
author: John Doe

title: Music Creation, Production And Sound Techniques
description:
From the studio to the live act, from the sound mixing table of a live concert, the production, creation to mastering.

Integration in the musical scene through the development of writing and composition skills, as well as technical knowledge about studio and live performance and production.

Studio and mixing table practice, recording and editing software, perception of mixing equilibrium and the mastering process.

During the course you will have access to recording/production studios, audio post-production and mastering rooms, stage concert environments, in partnership with Zipmix Studio and Coalman Recordings.

Learn from trainers who are active in the musical scene, the necessary tools to transform your ideas into music, at a professional level.
author: John Doe

title: Communication Design and Digital Marketing
description:
Develop your creativity and skillset and become a professional in Communication Design and Digital Marketing.

This course offers comprehensive training that prepares you for today's labour market, combining knowledge in Communication Design and Digital Marketing.

Advertising and Marketing Strategies: define business objectives, analyse the market and create an effective marketing plan.
Social Media Management: develop a content strategy, create post calendars and manage communication crises.
Advanced Content Creation: hone your skills in Photography, Videography, Sound and explore emerging technologies such as AI, AR and VR.
Performance Marketing : optimise online campaigns, create landing pages and use data analysis tools to make strategic decisions.
Implement metrics and interpret data for decision-making.
author: Jane Doe
